videoSnippet.title: Fabi Shows us How To Handle the Petrov || Caruana vs Lenderman || U.S. Championship (2019)
videoSnippet.description:
WATCH GRENKE TRAILER HERE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=27ec5obgwqg

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Fabiano Caruana vs Aleksandr Lenderman
US Championship (2019), rd 10, Mar-30 
Russian Game: Nimzowitsch Attack (C42)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Ne5 d6 4. Nf3 Ne4 5. Nc3 Nf6 6. d4 Be7 7. Bd3 O-O 8. O-O Nc6 9. d5 Nb4 10. Be2 c6 11. dc6 bc6 12. a3 Nbd5 13. Nd5 Nd5 14. Nd4 Bd7 15. Bf3 Rc8 16. Bd5 cd5 17. Be3 Bf6 18. Qd2 Qc7 19. h3 Rfe8 20. Rfe1 h6 21. c3 Qb7 22. Nf3 Re6 23. Bd4 Be7 24. b4 a6 25. a4 Re8 26. Kh2 Re4 27. Reb1 Bd8 28. b5 a5 29. Rb2 Qa8 30. Qd3 Qb7 31. Nd2 Rf4 32. Nb3 Bf5 33. Qg3 g5 34. b6 Qa6 35. Nd2 Bd7 36. Rab1 Qb7 37. Nb3 Qa6 38. Nc1 Qb7 39. Nd3 Rd4 40. cd4 Re6 41. Nf4 Re4 42. Ne2 Ba4 43. Nc3 Rd4 44. Qd6 Be7 45. Qe5 Re4 46. Ne4 de4 47. Rc1

The 2019 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $194,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

For the 11th consecutive year the Saint Louis Chess Club is hosting the event. Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
